MovieTitle.description: A catchy, concise title for the video (3-6 words).

InitialImagePrompt.description: Prompt for generating the opening frame image that starts the video sequence.

VideoPrompts.description: Video prompts for each segment, describing the action and camera movement.

NarrationScript.description: Narration text for each segment to be spoken by a voice actor.

MusicPrompt.description: Prompt describing the background music for the entire video.
